meanings.definition: Acquiring goods or services in exchange for money.
meanings.sent1: Her purchasing of the new dress made her very happy.
meanings.sent2: I need to do some purchasing for the upcoming party.
meanings.sent3: The cat's purchasing of the toy mouse was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His purchasing of knowledge through books opened new doors for him.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her purchasing echoed through the store.

meanings.sent1: Online purchasing has become very popular in recent years.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the thrill of in-person purchasing at the store.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's purchasing of a top hat was quite a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: His purchasing of time with loved ones is truly priceless.
meanings.sent5: The purchasing of the rare painting was a momentous occasion.
